algorithm

Class OpenStegoRandomLSBSteganography

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • algorithm.OpenStegoRandomLSBSteganography

  • public class OpenStegoRandomLSBSteganography
extends AbstractAlgorithm
    This plug-In uses the random LSB algorithm from the Open Stego tool. Because of license incompatibilities the LSB algorithm is delivered externally of PeriCAT. Therefore the technique will only work if the corresponding jar is present.

      • defineScenario

        Scenario defineScenario()
        Description copied from class: AbstractAlgorithm
        The constructor will call this function and initialise the classes scenario criteria with the returned criteria. Please note that the allowed values for the criteria of algorithm scenarios are 0 and 100. This is necessary for a correct distance calculation! Use the constants from this class.
        Specified by:
        defineScenario in class AbstractAlgorithm
        Returns:
        scenario criteria for this algorithm

      • restore

        public java.util.List<RestoredFile> restore(java.io.File carrier)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractAlgorithm
        Reverse the execution of this algorithm to restore the original payload, and if possible also the carrier files. Use AbstractAlgorithm.decapsulate(File) instead of this function, if you want to start a real decapsulation process, because it will also check if the file has the correct file type.
        Specified by:
        restore in class AbstractAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        carrier - the encapsulated data files
        Returns:
        decapsulated payload files, and if possible also original carrier files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
